title: Burn the Dark
description:
What if the good guy you fell for turned bad, and the bad guy swooped in to save the day?When I'm abducted, Zac is forced to make the decision he’s been running from for decades. Forever changed, he’s ripped away from me — leaving the perfect sized hole for Alex to step into.Struggling to come to terms with our own changes, Alex and I must work together to fix this mess caused by ancient legacy and a vampire leader hell-bent on using us for his own gain.But the vampires aren’t the only ones with something dark running through their veins… maybe underestimating me was the biggest mistake they all made?
Read the fast-paced sequel to Taste the Dark today!
Authors Note: For a full list of TWs/CWs, check the author’s website.
author: Nicola Rose
